name: 潘孟鉉
objective:
1.集合,序列與函數
2.基礎邏輯
3.關聯式
4.計數（排列,組合）
5.圖與樹（基礎圖論）
6.遞迴式與演算法
7.有向圖
1.Sets Sequences and Function
2.Elementary Logic
3.Relations
4.Counting
5.Graph and Tree
6.Recursion Trees and Algorithms
7.Digraphs
schedule:
Week1: Introduction to discrete math
Week2: Logic and proof
Week3: Logic and proof
Week4: Algorithm
Week5: Algorithm
Week6: Induction and recursion
Week7: Induction and recursion
Week8: Induction and recursion
Week9: Counting
Week10: Discrete probability (Midterm exam)
Week11: Advanced counting techniques
Week12: Advanced counting techniques
Week13: Relations
Week14: Relations
Week15: Graphs
Week16: Graphs
Week17: Trees
Week18: Trees (Final exam)
scorePolicy:
Midterm exam (30%)
Final exam (30%)
Homework and others (40%)
materials: Discrete mathematics and its applications, Kenneth H. Rosen, 7e.
